column2: Deepen our knowledge of the ECS pattern
As a framework user I want to create a World
As a framework user I want to manipulate the  World's Entities
As a framework user I want to manipulate the Entities' Components
As a framework user I want to define World's Views
As a framework user I want to define and use Systems
As a framework user I want to update the World's state
As a framework I want the framework to be able to update the state of at least 10'000 Entities in less than 10ms
As a framework user I would higly appreciate a handy DSL to perform these operations
As a framework user I want a working example of the framework
